attributes.action: To Make a change to help this planet
attributes.additional_details: It's great that people are starting to see what were doing to the planet. Even celebrity's have like take the song earth by lil Dicky that shows us people are trying to spread the message
attributes.background: Scientists say we have 12 years to sort the planet out so we need to do more to help such as more recycling and more bins to stop littering and have a fine if caught littering and we need to use less plastic in our daily lives and we need to plant more trees or we might not last much longer

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions about the issues you've raised. You might also like to sign one of these petitions if it calls for something you'd like to happen. You're more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258789

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241985

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236735
